mapper.insert: insert into zh_load_elecreceipt ( receipt_id, load_id, op_time, receipt_image_ref_id, status, source, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted )values ( #{receiptId}, #{loadId}, #{opTime}, #{receiptImageRefId}, #{status}, #{source}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now(), #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: update zh_load_elecreceipt set pid=#{pid}, receipt_id=#{receiptId}, load_id=#{loadId}, op_time=#{opTime}, receipt_image_ref_id=#{receiptImageRefId}, status=#{status}, source=#{source}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=#{createdTime}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_time=now(), is_deleted=#{isDeleted} where pid=#{pid} and receipt_id=#{receiptId}

update zh_load_elecreceipt
pid=#{pid},
receipt_id=#{receiptId},
load_id=#{loadId},
op_time=#{opTime},
receipt_image_ref_id=#{receiptImageRefId},
status=#{status},
source=#{source},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime},
updated_by=#{updatedBy},
is_deleted=#{isDeleted},
updated_time=now()
where pid=#{pid} and receipt_id=#{receiptId}
mapper.select: select pid, receipt_id, load_id, op_time, receipt_image_ref_id, status, source, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted from zh_load_elecreceipt where pid=#{pid} and receipt_id=#{receiptId}

select pid, receipt_id, load_id, op_time, receipt_image_ref_id, status, source, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted from zh_load_elecreceipt where pid=#{pid} and receipt_id=#{receiptId}
